summary: This is a brief internal email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It states that Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and is pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit (SHU). The document is dated July 28, 2019, two days before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the email, identified by his inmate number #76318-054, who is being taken off of Psych Observation and is pending transfer to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and is pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated July 28, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status.
It states that Epstein (#76318-054) is being taken off of Psych Observation.
It indicates Epstein is pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The email was sent two days before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019.
